trends: There has been one other sighting in Selinsgrove
There were no other sightings in Selinsgrove on or around August 31st 1992
divs: Sighting DetailsMy then boyfriend at the time pulled over when I saw a weird light in a farm field by the prison. It wasn't a tractor, plane or anything like that. It just sat there but was WAY too bright. And it was very dark out. I was really scared and didn't want him to get out of the car. He did. I didn't. But I watched him walk through the field. All I could stare at was the bright light. The next thing I knew he was back in the car but it was much later and we were arguing over how mud got in the car. The light was gone and I asked him about it but he didn't remember it. I just wanted out of there, so we left. When we went to pick up my kids we'd lost 3 hours and his mother was worried sick.
Summary: stopped by side of road at weird light lost time
